$comment: Config that is generated by the controller and use to provision the client when it is being first setup (i.e. not attached to projects).  Will serve as input to `2Keys provision` on the client.

twokeys.description: Contains information about the 2Keys install that provisioned this client

type.description: Tells us this is a CLIENT_SETUP config.  CLIENT_SETUP must be given for this value so we know we are parsing the right config

roots.description: Important directories on the client that the client needs to know about

config.description: Directory to store config files such as this config and the keyboard map

projects.description: Directory where projects will be stored (sub-folder for each project), with a project index in the root

server.description: Information about the 2Keys server this client is for
